document.full_text: president barack obama proposed cutting ballooning u.s. budget deficits by $4 trillion over 12 years on wednesday and called for talks with democratic and republican lawmakers to address the worsening fiscal woes.
document.title: obama targets $4 trillion cut in deficit
lines_and_colors: president barack obama proposed cutting ballooning u.s. budget deficits by $4 trillion over 12 years on wednesday and called for talks with democratic and republican lawmakers to address the worsening fiscal woes.
